description: This file defines the JwtTokenProvider class, which provides utility methods for generating, extracting data from, and validating JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) in a user management backend project.

classes.name: JwtTokenProvider
classes.description: A component responsible for generating and validating JWT tokens in the application.

methods.name: generateToken
methods.description: Creates a JWT token for a user identified by email, with an expiration time based on configured milliseconds.

methods.name: getEmailFromToken
methods.description: Extracts the user's email from the given JWT token.

methods.name: validateToken
methods.description: Validates the provided JWT token, returning true if valid and not expired, false otherwise.
